products.description: Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes are ultra-soft, alcohol-free, micellar-infused face wipes that gently dissolve makeup, oil, dirt, sweat, sunscreen, and even waterproof mascara in one easy step for clean, fresh-looking skin every day. Perfect for daily routines, travel, or gym bags, these disposable facial wipes and travel makeup wipes provide a quick, effective cleanse anytime. Made with 100% plant-based fibers, these compostable, biodegradable wipes break down in home compost within 35 days for sustainable skincare. Manufactured in the USA, Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes deliver reliable makeup removal and gentle cleansing power wherever you need it. These face wipes for women makeup remover needs and men are ideal for morning and evening skincare routines, removing impurities and pollution without harsh rubbing. Use as micellar water wipes for a refreshing cleanse after workouts or while traveling. Enjoy the confidence of knowing your skin is left clean, soft, and residue-free, with eco-friendly packaging that supports a sustainable lifestyle. Choose Neutrogena for trusted, effective, and gentle makeup remover wipes that combine convenience, performance, and environmental responsibility in every use.

products.description: PanOxyl Acne Foaming Wash is the Number One Best-Selling Acne Wash in the U.S.* (*data on file). Clear, treat, and prevent even the worst breakouts with PanOxyl 10% Benzoyl Peroxide Maximum Strength Acne Foaming Wash. This cleanser for acne-prone skin can be used on both the face and body. This daily antimicrobial cleanser contains 10% Benzoyl Peroxide, the highest concentration available without a prescription. This powerful daily face and body wash starts working quickly to clear acne and kills over 99% of acne-causing bacteria in 15 seconds (*Independent lab study, data on file). This treatment for pimples effectively penetrates pores, killing the bacteria that cause acne to clear existing acne blemishes and preventing new blemishes from forming. products.product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream, Body and Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Body Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramides, Daily Moisturizer, Oil-Free, Fragrance Free, Non-Comedogenic, 19 Ounce
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Creams & Moisturizers > Face Moisturizers
products.description:
Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Moisturizing Cream has a unique formula that provides 24-hour hydration and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1,3,6-II) and hyaluronic acid. This rich, non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula is ideal for sensitive skin on both the face and body Featuring our patented MVE Technology to release a steady stream of moisturizing ingredients throughout the day and night.
•Non-comedogenic•Fragrance-free•Oil-free•Hypoallergenic•Gentle, non-irritating formula•Suitable for sensitive skin
Key Ingredients:•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
•Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture
features: [ HYALURONIC ACID MOISTURIZER ] With hyaluronic acid, ceramides and MVE technology for 24 hour hydration. Rich, velvety texture that leaves skin feeling smooth, it is absorbed quickly for softened skin without greasy, sticky, feel.

[ MOISTURIZER FOR DRY SKIN ] A deficiency of ceramides in skin can often be associated with dry skin, which can feel itchy and look flaky. CeraVe Moisturizing Cream is formulated with three essential ceramides & hyaluronic acid.

[ GENTLE DAILY MOISTURIZER ] For face and body or can be used as a hand cream for dry skin relief. Holds National Eczema Association (NEA) Seal of Acceptance. Fragrance free, paraben free, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier.
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Creams & Moisturizers > Face Moisturizers
products.description:
EVEN OUT UNEVEN SKIN TONE — Unlock the power of a transparent collagen jelly cream designed to specifically target and target uneven skin tone. Reveal a more harmonious, luminous complexion for a naturally smooth and radiant look.
PRODUCT BENEFITS — Quickly reveals a more radiant, refreshed complexion with the ‘Korean Glass Glow’ effect post-application. Dermatologist-tested, low-irritating, silicone-free, maintains a skin-friendly pH of 5.69–7.69, and is free from artificial color.
KEY INGREDIENTS — Hydrolyzed Collagen: Smaller segments enable better skin absorption, preserving firmness and elasticity. Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): Supports the skin's barrier function and boosts hydration for improved texture.
DERMATOLOGIST TESTED — Skin firmness improved by 1.793% and sagging skin by 2.488% after 24 hours. *The above information pertains only to the characters of the raw materials *Clinical Trial Tested by the Global Dermatological Research Institute.' / Results may vary depending on individual skin types.
HOW TO APPLY — Apply a quarter amount of jelly cream morning and evening to the face and décolletage (neck & chest), after using targeted serums that address your individual skin concerns.

products.product_name: medicube PDRN Pink Peptide Serum with Salmon DNA | Pink Glow Serum with Peptides & Niacinamide for Hydration & Firm-Looking Skin | Uneven Tone Care | Korean Skincare, 1.01 fl. Oz

products.description:
KOREAN GLASS GLOW SKIN: This pink glow serum targets dull skin and boosts elasticity, helping to prevent future breakouts while enhancing the skin's glow and resilience.
SALMON DNA PDRN: Salmon DNA PDRN is a form of DNA extracted from salmon. It stimulates skin renewal and repair, giving your skin a clearer, more luminous complexion. It promotes a more even skin tone and a natural glow by improving skin health.
KEY INGREDIENTS: Containing Salmon DNA PDRN, five types of peptide complex, niacinamide, adenosine, and Ocimum Sanctum (Holy Basil) leaf extract, this formula provides effective care for uneven skin tone and elasticity.
LONG LASTING HYDRATION: Strengthens the skin’s barrier function, enhancing its resistance to external aggressors and pollutants. It provides deep hydration and smooths skin texture.
MILD FORMULA LIGHT TEXTURE: The formula is mild and gentle for all skin types—gentle enough to be used daily. Dermatologist-tested, low-irritating, and free from gluten and artificial colors.

GUARANTEED RESULTS OR YOUR MONEY BACK. We proudly stand behind every product we make. That's why all O'Keeffe's products have a 100%, money-back guarantee. products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Lips > Lip Stains
products.description:
Peel-off lip stain masque that lasts all day. Wonder Blading Peel and Reveal locks in color for a matte nude finish: waterproof, smudge proof so you skip touch-ups through drinks, meals, commutes, and workouts.
Matte nude lip stain and lip tint powered by Wonder Blading technology (Liquid Blading) fuses pigment into the top lip layer for locked-in color—no feathering, fading and budge-free. Long lasting, high-pigment, non-drying, kiss-proof wear with clean edges
1-Step Stain & Go - Achieving a low-maintenance, long-wear look has never been easier with our Lip Stain Masque. Apply the Lip Stain Masque and let it set for 10 - 30 seconds, then wipe away with a damp towel or tissue. You’ll be left with a natural lip stain that won’t budge or fade throughout the day, even when eating or drinking.
Buildable Lip Stain or Lip Liner Stain - Wear it all over for bold color or apply just to the edges as a lip liner stain. Re-apply for more vibrance, then remove easily with any oil-based makeup remover.
13 Universally Flattering Shades - We offer the perfect shade for everyone and every occasion, including nude lip stain, pink lip stain, and even a bold red lip stain. Our lip tints are universally flattering, with soft fresh tints that suit any skin tone. And our lip makeup is designed to last, providing a lip stain long lasting formula that won’t fade or budge throughout the day.

products.product_name: Al-Rehab Choco Musk Eau de Parfum Spray for Women, 1.65 oz/50 ml
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Fragrance > Women's > Eau de Parfum
products.description: Choco Musk is not just a fragrance; it's a delicate dance of sweet shades that captivates the senses. The delightful aroma begins with the chic allure of white musk, falling under the spell of incomparable white chocolate. Each note in the composition complements the other, creating a harmonious blend that emphasizes without overwhelming. As the fragrance unfolds, the middle notes gently merge, introducing spicy cinnamon, creamy vanilla, and the enchanting essence of rose. The base notes add a touch of oriental mystique, with exciting amber and myrrh weaving together with a noble sandalwood tint. The result is a sweet harmony that plays with shades of dessert perfumes in all their splendor. Choco Musk is a delicacy that transcends seasons, inviting you into a fairy-tale captivity of sweet indulgence. Whether it's the warmth of summer or the coziness of winter, let this fragrance be your year-round temptation, teasing and charming those around you. The 50ml Eau de Parfum bottle is an elegant testament to the luxurious experience that awaits you. With its refined design, it complements the richness of the fragrance within, enhancing the overall indulgence. Choco Musk isn't just a fragrance; it's a captivating tale of sweet temptation. Let it be your daily indulgence, a sensory journey into the heart of dessert-inspired luxury.
features: Choco Musk Eau de Parfum by Al-Rehab is a Aromatic fragrance for women
Top Notes: White Musk, Milk Chocolate and Vanilla
Middle Notes: Cinnamon, Rose and Sandalwood
Base Notes: Myrrh, Amber And Spicy Notes
Long lasting fragrance

products.product_name: Beetles 2 Pcs 15ml No Wipe Gel Top Coat and Base Coat Set - Shine Finish and Long Lasting Soak Off LED Nail Lamp Gel Base Top Coat Finish Nail Art Design Manicure Gifts for Women
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Foot, Hand & Nail Care > Nail Art & Polish > Base & Top Coats > Combination Base & Top Coats
products.description:
Beetles No Wipe Top Coat and Base Coat: Enjoy long-lasting wear for over 28 days with a perfect shine. The flexible top coat prevents nicks, chips, and smudges. Tip: The base coat is designed to remain sticky, providing a solid foundation for the next coat of polish. (Note: The base gel should not be used as glue.)
High-Quality and Protective: Beetles Glossy No Wipe Top Coat and base, with proper application, can last with a perfect shine. The flexible top coat avoids nicks, chips, or smudges. Ideal Mother's Day gifts for her. Tips: Avoid touching your nails after curing the top coat for 2 minutes to enhance the shine.
Easy Application and Good Tenacity:If you have sensitive skin, we recommend using this product in conjunction with Liquid Peel off Latex Tape. This tape minimizes direct skin contact with the gel, reducing the chance of allergic reactions. It also helps in achieving more precise nail art. Please note that Liquid Peel off Latex Tape is not included with this product and must be purchased separately.
Reminder: In low temperatures, the base coat may become clumpy or thick, which can cause the brush to break off inside the bottle. If this happens, please contact us for satisfactory after-sales service. Tip: There's no need to wipe off the tacky residue of the base coat, as it helps the color coat adhere longer to your nails.If you feel a burning sensation during curing, it is recommended to remove your hand from the lamp. Resume curing once the sensation returns to normal.
Tips for preventing nail surface peeling off:(1) Polishing of the nail surface: Polish the front, side and trailing edge of the nail until there are no reflective spots on the nail surface(2) Nail surface cleaning: It is recommended to use Nail dehydrator to remove oil and moisture from the nail surface(3)Lighting time: It is recommended that the lighting time for base Coat, Color Gel and Top Coat at least 60 seconds.

products.product_name: CHI 44 Iron Guard Thermal Protection Spray, Nourishing Formula Helps Resist Heat Damage to Hair & Tame Frizz, Clear, 8 Oz
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Hair Care > Styling Products > Styling Treatments
products.description:
Shield your hair from the heat of styling tools with the CHI 44 Iron Guard Thermal Protection Spray. This iconic heat protectant provides a protective barrier to strands while ensuring your hair remains sleek, shiny, and healthy.
CHI haircare and tools are manufactured by Farouk Systems a Houston based company.
features: HEAT PROTECTANT SPRAY: Hair-nourishing thermal protection spray forms a powerful barrier against the styling heat up to 450°F. Safeguard your hair from damage & maintain its health. Beyond protection, this spray leaves your hair looking smooth & shiny.

CHI 44 IRON GUARD: Strengthen hair and enhance its resilience against heat damage from styling tools. This haircare system significantly reduces damage by providing layered protection and resilience from cleansing to styling.

CHI HAIRSPRAYS: CHI Sprays use ceramic and proteins to provide outstanding hair protection. Ceramic compound releases anions on the cuticles, which help to interlink the proteins into the hair strands imparting luster & strength for a healthy appearance.
HOW TO USE: Section your hair and spray it with CHI 44 Iron Guard evenly over dry hair. Start using your heat tool from roots to ends. Can also use on wet hair before drying.

CHI: Founded by Farouk Shami, a hairdresser allergic to ammonia who sought to create the first ammonia-free hair color & has remained committed to crafting the finest ethical haircare. All CHI products are cruelty-free, paraben-free, & sulfate-free.

products.description: Feel fearless. Feel reborn. Feel free to live beautifully, every day, no matter how you style your hair. products.product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream, Body and Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Body Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramides, Daily Moisturizer, Oil-Free, Fragrance Free, Non-Comedogenic, 19 Ounce
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Creams & Moisturizers > Face Moisturizers
products.description:
Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Moisturizing Cream has a unique formula that provides 24-hour hydration and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1,3,6-II) and hyaluronic acid. This rich, non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula is ideal for sensitive skin on both the face and body Featuring our patented MVE Technology to release a steady stream of moisturizing ingredients throughout the day and night.
•Non-comedogenic•Fragrance-free•Oil-free•Hypoallergenic•Gentle, non-irritating formula•Suitable for sensitive skin
Key Ingredients:•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
•Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture
features: [ HYALURONIC ACID MOISTURIZER ] With hyaluronic acid, ceramides and MVE technology for 24 hour hydration. Rich, velvety texture that leaves skin feeling smooth, it is absorbed quickly for softened skin without greasy, sticky, feel.

[ MOISTURIZER FOR DRY SKIN ] A deficiency of ceramides in skin can often be associated with dry skin, which can feel itchy and look flaky. CeraVe Moisturizing Cream is formulated with three essential ceramides & hyaluronic acid.

[ GENTLE DAILY MOISTURIZER ] For face and body or can be used as a hand cream for dry skin relief. Holds National Eczema Association (NEA) Seal of Acceptance. Fragrance free, paraben free, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier.
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.

FLYHIT Large Towel Warmer for Bathroom - Heated Towel Warmers Bucket, Wood Handle, Auto Shut Off, Fits Up to Two 40"X70" Oversized Towels, Bathrobes, Blankets, for Mother's Gifts, White
products.breadcrumb: Home & Kitchen > Bath > Bathroom Accessories > Towel Warmers
products.description:
Generous Capacity Warmer: This spacious bathroom essential can easily accommodate two extra-large 40" x 70" bath towels, along with robes, blankets, pajamas, and more. Alternatively, it can hold around 5 medium-sized bath towels. With dimensions of 11.53" in length, 11.53" in width, and 19" in height, it boasts a total capacity of 20 liters, making it ideal for family use. Elevate your home with a spa-like touch.You can safely heat cotton materials, but please refrain from heating chemical fiber towels or clothing, as well as any materials that are not heat-resistant.Do not use it to dry wet towels or other damp items.
Experience Swift Heating: With a simple process, just place your towels within the warmer, shut the lid, and press the WORK button. The 450W heating element ensures even warming, bringing your towels to a cozy temperature within 25 minutes. Use the TIMER button to choose a preservation time between 1 to 4 hours, guaranteeing a supply of warm towels whenever desired. Immerse yourself in a spa-like oasis right in your own bathroom.Upon startup, the built-in timer defaults to 30 minutes. If you wish to keep it on for 30 minutes, there is no need for set. The indicator light will automatically illuminate once the 30-minute insulation mode is activated.
Safety at the Core: Safety is paramount, which is why our ETL-certified towel warmer features a wooden lid and a fire-resistant, eco-friendly plastic exterior that poses no allergenic risks to the body. The triple-layer temperature control mechanism automatically shuts off the heater if the internal bucket temperature becomes too high, effectively preventing any potential overheating issues. Enjoy the warmth indoors with complete peace of mind, relishing in your spa-inspired experience.Please take note of the bucket body indicator: It is unsafe to touch the interior of the device when the hot surface indicator light is on.
A Remarkable Gift: This versatile towel warmer serves as the ultimate accessory for various settings, including homes, pools, showers, hotels, salons, spas, massages, baby care, and elderly care. Once you've indulged in the luxury of warm towels, you'll be treated to a delightful surprise after every bath. It's a thoughtful and considerate gift choice for housewarmings, weddings, showers, birthdays, anniversaries, and countless other occasions.
Our After Sale Service: FLYHIT After Sale Service: Our friendly and reliable customer service will respond to you within 24 hours. You can purchase with confidence, with our 30-day return and 12-month replacement.

products.product_name: Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes Micellar Alcohol-Free Face Towelettes Remove Waterproof Mascara & Oil, Compostable 100% Plant-Based Cloth, Dermatologist & Ophthalmologist Tested, Twin Pack 2 x 25 ct
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Cleansers > Cloths & Towelettes
products.description: Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes are ultra-soft, alcohol-free, micellar-infused face wipes that gently dissolve makeup, oil, dirt, sweat, sunscreen, and even waterproof mascara in one easy step for clean, fresh-looking skin every day. Each twin pack includes two 25-count packs (50 wipes total) for daily convenience at home or on the go. These makeup remover wipes feature a triple emollient formula that leaves skin feeling refreshed, nourished, and conditioned with no heavy residue and no need to rinse. Designed for sensitive skin and gentle on the delicate eye area, these face cleansing wipes are ophthalmologist-, dermatologist-, and allergy-tested. The wipes are formulated without phthalates, parabens, sulfates, soaps, alcohols, or dyes, making them suitable for all skin types. Perfect for daily routines, travel, or gym bags, these disposable facial wipes and travel makeup wipes provide a quick, effective cleanse anytime. Made with 100% plant-based fibers, these compostable, biodegradable wipes break down in home compost within 35 days for sustainable skincare. Manufactured in the USA, Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes deliver reliable makeup removal and gentle cleansing power wherever you need it. These face wipes for women makeup remover needs and men are ideal for morning and evening skincare routines, removing impurities and pollution without harsh rubbing. Use as micellar water wipes for a refreshing cleanse after workouts or while traveling. Enjoy the confidence of knowing your skin is left clean, soft, and residue-free, with eco-friendly packaging that supports a sustainable lifestyle. Choose Neutrogena for trusted, effective, and gentle makeup remover wipes that combine convenience, performance, and environmental responsibility in every use.
features: Twin Pack with 25-count of Neutrogena Makeup Remover Ultra-Soft Micellar Cleansing Wipes to gently cleanse and effectively lift away up to 99% of makeup, including long wear makeup while leaving skin feeling refreshed & conditioned

Makeup remover wipes work to dissolve traces of dirt, remove bacteria, impurities, oil and makeup on skin while also removing pollution, sweat and sunscreen, for superior cleansing and makeup removing power in a convenient disposable wipe

Daily facial cleansing wipes are formulated with a triple emollient blend to gently dissolve makeup and impurities, even waterproof mascara, while conditioning skin. Leaving skin refreshingly clean with no heavy residue. No rinsing required

These facial cleaning wipes are ophthalmologist-, dermatologist- and allergy-tested and formulated without fragrance, parabens, alcohol, sulfates, phthalates, soaps, and dyes. They are gentle enough for daily use, even around the delicate eye area

These makeup remover wipes are made with 100% plant based cloth. To use, gently wipe over eyelids, face, lips, and neck. No rinsing required. Dispose of wipe in home compost or trash receptacle, do not flush

products.description: eos Vanilla Cashmere Body Wash turns your daily shower into a creamy, feel-good body care ritual. This moisturizing body wash gently cleanses while wrapping skin in a warm, decadent vanilla scent with soft cashmere vibes. The pH-balanced formula creates a rich, foamy lather that rinses clean, leaving skin feeling silky, smooth, and comforted. Infused with a nourishing blend of shea butter, cocoa butter, glycerin, vitamin E, and sunflower seed oil, this vanilla body wash helps lock in moisture and support soft, healthy-feeling skin. Designed for women and gynecologist approved, it’s gentle enough for sensitive skin and perfect for everyday use. Complete your routine by layering with Vanilla Cashmere Body Lotion and Body Mist for a long-lasting scent experience.
features: VANILLA CASHMERE FRAGRANCE: Features rich notes of whipped vanilla, soft musk, and cozy caramel for a warm, nuzzly scent
MOISTURIZING BODY WASH: A creamy, foaming formula that gently cleanses while helping skin feel hydrated, smooth, and comforted after every shower
SKIN-LOVING INGREDIENTS: Powered by glycerin, cocoa seed butter, shea butter & oil, sunflower seed oil, and vitamin E to nourish, soften, and help lock in moisture
SKIN-SAFE & pH-BALANCED: Dermatologist recommended, gynecologist and bikini area–approved with a pH-balanced formula suitable for sensitive skin

products.product_name: PanOxyl 10% Benzoyl Peroxide Acne Foaming Wash, Maximum Strength, Daily Acne-Fighting Face and Body Cleanser, Face Wash to Clear, Treat and Prevent Acne Pimples and Stubborn Breakouts, 5.5 Oz Tube
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Cleansers > Washes
products.description: PanOxyl Acne Foaming Wash is the Number One Best-Selling Acne Wash in the U.S.* (*data on file). Clear, treat, and prevent even the worst breakouts with PanOxyl 10% Benzoyl Peroxide Maximum Strength Acne Foaming Wash. This cleanser for acne-prone skin can be used on both the face and body. This daily antimicrobial cleanser contains 10% Benzoyl Peroxide, the highest concentration available without a prescription. This powerful daily face and body wash starts working quickly to clear acne and kills over 99% of acne-causing bacteria in 15 seconds (*Independent lab study, data on file). This treatment for pimples effectively penetrates pores, killing the bacteria that cause acne to clear existing acne blemishes and preventing new blemishes from forming. Acne treatments can be harsh and drying to the skin, so PanOxyl’s benzoyl peroxide washes contain moisturizers to combat dryness. Complicated skincare routines? No thanks. Directions for use: Wet area to be cleansed; Apply and massage into skin for 1-2 minutes; Rinse thoroughly and pat dry; Apply once daily, then gradually increase to two or three times daily if needed or as directed by a doctor. PanOxyl products use high-quality, scientifically proven ingredients to banish breakouts without a prescription, so you can be your clearest, most confident you.
features: Millions sold – The Number One Best-Selling Acne Wash in the U.S.*, this daily foaming face cleanser clears, treats, and prevents breakouts. (*Data on File)
Starts working fast – A dermatologist-recommended antimicrobial treatment for acne pimples and stubborn breakouts that kills 99% of bacteria in just 15 seconds.
Maximum Strength – Contains 10% Benzoyl Peroxide, the highest concentration of this dermatologist-favorite, acne-fighting ingredient over the counter.
Multi-Use Cleanser – Helps break the acne cycle to clear and unclog pores on the face, chest, and back

Helps fight dryness – Acne treatments can be harsh and drying to the skin, so this cleanser for acne, whiteheads, and blackheads contains moisturizers to combat dryness. Non-comedogenic, unscented, and safe for daily use.

products.product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream, Body and Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Body Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramides, Daily Moisturizer, Oil-Free, Fragrance Free, Non-Comedogenic, 19 Ounce
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Creams & Moisturizers > Face Moisturizers
products.description:
Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Moisturizing Cream has a unique formula that provides 24-hour hydration and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1,3,6-II) and hyaluronic acid. This rich, non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula is ideal for sensitive skin on both the face and body Featuring our patented MVE Technology to release a steady stream of moisturizing ingredients throughout the day and night.
•Non-comedogenic•Fragrance-free•Oil-free•Hypoallergenic•Gentle, non-irritating formula•Suitable for sensitive skin
Key Ingredients:•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
•Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture
features: [ HYALURONIC ACID MOISTURIZER ] With hyaluronic acid, ceramides and MVE technology for 24 hour hydration. Rich, velvety texture that leaves skin feeling smooth, it is absorbed quickly for softened skin without greasy, sticky, feel.

[ MOISTURIZER FOR DRY SKIN ] A deficiency of ceramides in skin can often be associated with dry skin, which can feel itchy and look flaky. CeraVe Moisturizing Cream is formulated with three essential ceramides & hyaluronic acid.

[ GENTLE DAILY MOISTURIZER ] For face and body or can be used as a hand cream for dry skin relief. Holds National Eczema Association (NEA) Seal of Acceptance. Fragrance free, paraben free, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier.
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.

products.product_name: medicube Jelly Cream with Collagen, Niacinamide | Freeze-Dried Hydrolyzed Collagen for Skin Barrier Hydration & 24H Glow | Plumper, Firmer looking skin | 3.71 fl.oz
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Creams & Moisturizers > Face Moisturizers
products.description:
EVEN OUT UNEVEN SKIN TONE — Unlock the power of a transparent collagen jelly cream designed to specifically target and target uneven skin tone. Reveal a more harmonious, luminous complexion for a naturally smooth and radiant look.
PRODUCT BENEFITS — Quickly reveals a more radiant, refreshed complexion with the ‘Korean Glass Glow’ effect post-application. Dermatologist-tested, low-irritating, silicone-free, maintains a skin-friendly pH of 5.69–7.69, and is free from artificial color.
KEY INGREDIENTS — Hydrolyzed Collagen: Smaller segments enable better skin absorption, preserving firmness and elasticity. Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): Supports the skin's barrier function and boosts hydration for improved texture.
DERMATOLOGIST TESTED — Skin firmness improved by 1.793% and sagging skin by 2.488% after 24 hours. *The above information pertains only to the characters of the raw materials *Clinical Trial Tested by the Global Dermatological Research Institute.' / Results may vary depending on individual skin types.
HOW TO APPLY — Apply a quarter amount of jelly cream morning and evening to the face and décolletage (neck & chest), after using targeted serums that address your individual skin concerns.

SALMON DNA PDRN: Salmon DNA PDRN is a form of DNA extracted from salmon. It stimulates skin renewal and repair, giving your skin a clearer, more luminous complexion. It promotes a more even skin tone and a natural glow by improving skin health.

LONG LASTING HYDRATION: Strengthens the skin’s barrier function, enhancing its resistance to external aggressors and pollutants. It provides deep hydration and smooths skin texture.
MILD FORMULA LIGHT TEXTURE: The formula is mild and gentle for all skin types—gentle enough to be used daily. Dermatologist-tested, low-irritating, and free from gluten and artificial colors.

products.description:
EXCEPTIONAL BODY PERFECTOR: Available in 6 buildable shades, this innovative leg & body foundation instantly evens your skin tone and conceals everything from stretch marks, dark spots and scars to veins and tattoos for an illuminated, natural-looking glow; the versatile formula is also a great alternative to self tanner
24-HOUR WEAR: Unlike traditional leg and body makeup, Body Coverage Perfector is waterproof, sweatproof, transfer-resistant and lasts for more than 24 hours

products.description: L’Oral Paris presents Telescopic Original Mascara enhances your lashes with intense length and unique lash by lash separation. Ophthalmologist-tested and allergy-tested. Suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers. • Intense length • Up to 60 percent longer lashes • Flexible Precision Brush • Place the brush at the base of lashes and gently sweep up to tip. To safeguard L'Oreal purity, reserve this product for your personal use. Treat the applicator with the hygienic care you give your eyes. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle. Do not dilute mascara with water, saliva, or any other substance. Cap tightly after use. If change in odor or appearance occurs, discontinue use. Do not use this or any other eye cosmetic if your eye is injured, irritated, or infected. Consult a physician promptly.

products.description:
[24 HOUR WATERPROOF FIX] TIRTIR Waterproof Setting Spray ensures your makeup stays intact for 24 hours, even through sweat, water, and outdoor activities. A powerful, non sticky formula keeps your look fresh and flawless from morning to night.
[ETHANOL FREE FORMULA] Our makeup setting spray is ethanol free, perfect for sensitive skin. With a gentle, refreshing mist, it provides a breathable finish without irritation or discomfort, ensuring long lasting hold without harming your skin.
[ACTIVITY PROOF & SMUDGE PROOF] Keep your makeup intact regardless of your day’s activities. TIRTIR setting spray resists sweat, water, and even chlorinated pool water, giving you a durable, matte finish that won’t smudge or transfer.
[SEMI MATTE, NON GREASY FINISH] Enjoy a semi matte finish with a natural, breathable feel. This setting spray creates a flexible barrier that locks makeup in place without the tightness, offering a fresh, non cakey look all day long.
[CLINICALLY TESTED & SAFE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES] Dermatologist approved and clinically tested for skin irritation, this makeup fixer is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Its soothing ingredients calm the skin while keeping your makeup flawless.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Lips > Lip Stains
products.description:
Peel-off lip stain masque that lasts all day. Wonder Blading Peel and Reveal locks in color for a matte nude finish: waterproof, smudge proof so you skip touch-ups through drinks, meals, commutes, and workouts.
Matte nude lip stain and lip tint powered by Wonder Blading technology (Liquid Blading) fuses pigment into the top lip layer for locked-in color—no feathering, fading and budge-free. Long lasting, high-pigment, non-drying, kiss-proof wear with clean edges
1-Step Stain & Go - Achieving a low-maintenance, long-wear look has never been easier with our Lip Stain Masque. Apply the Lip Stain Masque and let it set for 10 - 30 seconds, then wipe away with a damp towel or tissue. You’ll be left with a natural lip stain that won’t budge or fade throughout the day, even when eating or drinking.
Buildable Lip Stain or Lip Liner Stain - Wear it all over for bold color or apply just to the edges as a lip liner stain. Re-apply for more vibrance, then remove easily with any oil-based makeup remover.
13 Universally Flattering Shades - We offer the perfect shade for everyone and every occasion, including nude lip stain, pink lip stain, and even a bold red lip stain. Our lip tints are universally flattering, with soft fresh tints that suit any skin tone. And our lip makeup is designed to last, providing a lip stain long lasting formula that won’t fade or budge throughout the day.

Choosing us means opting for a lifestyle that is friendly to animals and responsible towards the environment.

This cosmetic set will have her feeling and acting like her favorite princess or hero in no time! Great birthday or holiday gift idea.
EASY AND FUN TO APPLY: This set enables kids to explore fashion and beauty safely. Great for their slumber party or to host a play spa day. This kit is the complete beauty makeover set your little one deserves.
MORE FUN FOR EVERYONE: Decorating hair, nails and lips is a fun activity that she can share with her friends at birthdays, summer vacations, sleepovers, makeovers, and more! Also, can be used as party favors, stocking stuffers, school rewards and back-to-school.

products.description:
MULTICOLOR: Includes three baked neutral eyeshadows in subdued yet vibrant shades; a creamy bronze highlighter that infuses the skin with glamorous warm tones; light gold and champagne shades that instantly highlight with a single swipe; and a creamy peach-pink blush that delivers a naturally sweet flush.
INTENSE COLOR PIGMENTS: Each shade is enriched with highly concentrated pigments for rich, vibrant colors that create a striking and distinctive facial expression, with just one swipe for coverage.
CRAFTSMANSHIP: Highly pigmented powders allow you to mold your features to your heart's content, whether it's a natural look with soft contours or an eye-catching look with bold, dramatic effects.
LONG-LASTING MAKEUP: Using a premium formula, LLASIDO makeup stays vibrant and flawless for hours without fading or smudging, ensuring a perfect look all day long.
HOW TO USE: Eyeshadow: Sweep eyeshadow lightly over the entire eye socket, using darker shades to deepen the layering in the eye socket, and finish with a light highlight under the brow to create dimension. Highlight: Apply highlighter to cheekbones, bridge of nose and cupid's bow to create a natural glow and instantly enhance facial radiance. Blush: Apply blush to the cheeks and smudge for a fresh, vibrant look. Bronzer: Apply bronzing powder to the entire face or swipe it over the temples, cheekbone hollows and jawline to create a warm, contoured look that accentuates facial lines.

products.description: Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes are ultra-soft, alcohol-free, micellar-infused face wipes that gently dissolve makeup, oil, dirt, sweat, sunscreen, and even waterproof mascara in one easy step for clean, fresh-looking skin every day. Each twin pack includes two 25-count packs (50 wipes total) for daily convenience at home or on the go. These makeup remover wipes feature a triple emollient formula that leaves skin feeling refreshed, nourished, and conditioned with no heavy residue and no need to rinse. Designed for sensitive skin and gentle on the delicate eye area, these face cleansing wipes are ophthalmologist-, dermatologist-, and allergy-tested. The wipes are formulated without phthalates, parabens, sulfates, soaps, alcohols, or dyes, making them suitable for all skin types. Perfect for daily routines, travel, or gym bags, these disposable facial wipes and travel makeup wipes provide a quick, effective cleanse anytime. Made with 100% plant-based fibers, these compostable, biodegradable wipes break down in home compost within 35 days for sustainable skincare. Manufactured in the USA, Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes deliver reliable makeup removal and gentle cleansing power wherever you need it. These face wipes for women makeup remover needs and men are ideal for morning and evening skincare routines, removing impurities and pollution without harsh rubbing. Use as micellar water wipes for a refreshing cleanse after workouts or while traveling. Enjoy the confidence of knowing your skin is left clean, soft, and residue-free, with eco-friendly packaging that supports a sustainable lifestyle. Choose Neutrogena for trusted, effective, and gentle makeup remover wipes that combine convenience, performance, and environmental responsibility in every use.

This daily antimicrobial cleanser contains 10% Benzoyl Peroxide, the highest concentration available without a prescription. This powerful daily face and body wash starts working quickly to clear acne and kills over 99% of acne-causing bacteria in 15 seconds (*Independent lab study, data on file). This treatment for pimples effectively penetrates pores, killing the bacteria that cause acne to clear existing acne blemishes and preventing new blemishes from forming. products.description:
Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Moisturizing Cream has a unique formula that provides 24-hour hydration and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1,3,6-II) and hyaluronic acid. This rich, non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula is ideal for sensitive skin on both the face and body Featuring our patented MVE Technology to release a steady stream of moisturizing ingredients throughout the day and night.
•Non-comedogenic•Fragrance-free•Oil-free•Hypoallergenic•Gentle, non-irritating formula•Suitable for sensitive skin
Key Ingredients:•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
•Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture
features: [ HYALURONIC ACID MOISTURIZER ] With hyaluronic acid, ceramides and MVE technology for 24 hour hydration. Rich, velvety texture that leaves skin feeling smooth, it is absorbed quickly for softened skin without greasy, sticky, feel.

[ MOISTURIZER FOR DRY SKIN ] A deficiency of ceramides in skin can often be associated with dry skin, which can feel itchy and look flaky. CeraVe Moisturizing Cream is formulated with three essential ceramides & hyaluronic acid.

[ GENTLE DAILY MOISTURIZER ] For face and body or can be used as a hand cream for dry skin relief. Holds National Eczema Association (NEA) Seal of Acceptance. Fragrance free, paraben free, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier.
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.

products.description:
Anti-Aging Effect: Maskiss under eye patches with collagen as an anti-aging component prevent the formation of wrinkles and 24K nano gold with a protective effect helps prevent your skin from sagging.
Puffy Eyes And Dark Circles Treatment: Maskiss under eye patches are highly effective eye skin care treatments that will quickly work against skin aging, flat wrinkles & fine lines, eliminate dark circles, remove puffiness, and speed up the cell and collagen rejuvenation.
Hydrating & Moisturizing: Hyaluronic acid in Maskiss under eye patches helps to hydrate and moisturize your skin, providing a long-lasting effect. You will notice your skin is refreshed and hydrated from the very first application. Reveal a younger-looking you.
Easy To Use: Clean your face and eyes with warm water, then put eye pads under your eyes and press gently to secure them. Keep it for 20 minutes, remove the eye pads and gently pat the remaining essence. Twice a day or at least once a week.
Safe & Effective Ingredients: Infused with a blend of collagen, hyaluronic acids, and a variety of natural plant extracts that deeply repair the eye skin, help soothe, rejuvenate & protect the skin around your gorgeous peepers without any side effects.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Maternity
products.description:
𝗘𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗬𝗼𝘂 𝗡𝗲𝗲𝗱 𝗶𝗻 𝗢𝗻𝗲 𝗞𝗶𝘁: Glamommy Postpartum Essentials Kit is your complete solution - it includes 𝟏𝟕𝐨𝐳 𝐏𝐞𝐫𝐢 𝐁𝐨𝐭𝐭𝐥𝐞, 𝟑.𝟓𝐨𝐳 𝐒𝐨𝐨𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐒𝐩𝐫𝐚𝐲, 𝟒𝐩𝐜𝐬 𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐩𝐨𝐬𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐔𝐧𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐰𝐞𝐚𝐫, 𝟖𝐩𝐜𝐬 𝐒𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐲 𝐍𝐚𝐩𝐤𝐢𝐧, 𝟐𝐩𝐜𝐬 𝐇𝐨𝐭&𝐂𝐨𝐥𝐝 𝐏𝐚𝐜𝐤𝐬 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝟏𝟔𝐩𝐜𝐬 𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐩𝐨𝐬𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐒𝐥𝐞𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐬, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝟐𝟒𝐩𝐜𝐬 𝐂𝐨𝐨𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐖𝐢𝐩𝐞𝐬. Skip the hassle of complex prenatal prep—just grab this all-in-one kit and you're all set.
𝗦𝗮𝘆 𝗙𝗮𝗿𝗲𝘄𝗲𝗹𝗹 𝘁𝗼 𝗣𝗼𝘀𝘁𝗽𝗮𝗿𝘁𝘂𝗺 𝗗𝗶𝘀𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗳𝗼𝗿𝘁: The peri bottle thoroughly cleanses sensitive areas, while the cooling spray delivers soothing relief from swelling and pain. Spend your time enjoying those precious moments, and focus on snuggling that little one instead of dealing with discomfort.
𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗿𝘆-𝗙𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝗣𝗼𝘀𝘁𝗽𝗮𝗿𝘁𝘂𝗺 𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗳𝗼𝗿𝘁: Enjoy the softness of these skin-friendly disposable underwear, designed with a high-rise fit for all body types. Their durable, stretchable weave ensures they won't tear. Paired with large, absorbent sanitary pads, you can move freely without the worry of postpartum leaks.

products.description:
BACK TO THE BASICS: Meet our Universal Starter Kit for hydrated, glowing skin. This 5-step routine boosts, build + protects skin, serving as the building blocks to your best skin. Clincally proven to maintain + protect the skin barrier.
HYDRATE + REBUILD: Skin-loving ingredients work to rebuild + protect the skin barrier. Powerful humectants lock in moisture to minimize trans-epidermal water loss (TEWL).
BARRIER-BOOSTING: BYOMA’s carefully researched Tri-Ceramide Complex is designed to mimic and replenish the essential lipids found in skin. Formulated to rebuild the skin barrier + restore moisture levels, ensuring skin functions at its best every day.
THE ULTIMATE SKIN-COMPATIBLE SOLUTION: Dermatologist tested + approved skin care, soap-free, non-comedogenic, alcohol + fragrance-free, vegan + cruelty free. Suitable for all skin types.
BACKED BY SCIENCE: Efficacy is the new luxury. That's why BYOMA delivers clinically-proven formulas backed by science + powered by actives. When we stop stripping our skin + start boosting our barrier, we find the key to balanced, brighter skin.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Sunscreens & Tanning Products > Sunscreens > Body Sunscreens
products.description:
SPF 70 broad spectrum sunscreen lotion delivers high UVA/UVB protection for daily use; water resistant for up to 80 minutes to help guard skin during outdoor activities. Apply 15 minutes before sun exposure and reapply as directed.
Lightweight, oil-free, non-comedogenic Dry-Touch formula absorbs quickly for most users, leaving an ultra-light feel. Finish may vary; some may notice a slight sheen or visible white cast, especially on medium to dark skin tones.
Oxybenzone-free, Hawaii Act 104 compliant, PABA-free body sunscreen; powered by Helioplex technology to provide stable protection against aging UVA and burning UVB rays while helping defend skin from environmental stressors.
Convenient 3 fl oz travel size is TSA compliant and easy to pack in carry-ons, gym bags, or backpacks; a portable sunscreen lotion for on-the-go protection at the beach, park, or commute without weighing down your routine.
Trusted by dermatologists, this formula includes antioxidant Vitamin E for added defense. For best results, reapply at least every 2 hours and after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating; a minority may experience irritation—patch test if unsure.

products.description: Help protect skin from sun damage and fight pollution and dryness with Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield Hydrating Water Gel Face Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 25 Sunscreen and hyaluronic acid. Suitable for all skin types, this water gel daily face moisturizer helps fight the signs of tired, dull-looking skin. It contains broad spectrum SPF 25 UVA/UVB sunscreen boosted with a complex of purified hyaluronic acid, a hydrator found naturally in the skin that binds to water and holds it in. The hydrating water gel sunscreen also contains antioxidants, known to help fight daily aggressors like pollution. The lightweight, non-comedogenic, alcohol-, and oil-free formula can be applied alone or under makeup, making Neutrogena Hydro Boost City Shield Water Gel SPF 25 the perfect addition to your daily skincare routine. Designed with the Earth in mind. We've removed the window and plastic tray from this carton for easier recycling.
